name: places/ChIJT9GG8XhZwokR2cM_hhQT5pQ
formattedAddress: 304 W 92nd St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 304 W 92nd St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: My dad's 70th birthday was around the corner and we wanted to do something special for this milestone. I heard about Fork in the Woods from a friend who had Chef Greg cook for her and her husband. He came highly recommended so I reached out. Greg saw our vision and was able to deliver beyond my wildest dreams. My dad is a steakhouse fanatic so we wanted to replicate that experience in the comfort of our home. We carefully planned the menu, making sure to have all the favorites plus some additions. He arrived about 3 hours prior to dinner time with some parts of the meal prepped (sauces/dressings) while others were prepped right in my sister's kitchen. We provided the space and he created a 5-star meal using whatever we had in the kitchen. His ability to adapt to his surroundings was remarkable. We were able to relax and socialize in the basement while Greg was in the kitchen preparing the meal. Once the meal was complete, he sat us, served the meal and made sure we had everything we needed. He cleared dishes and helped with drinks as well. He even cleaned the kitchen (my sister and I joked that it was more spotless than it was prior to his arrival). His professionalism and passion for cooking came across in the meal he prepared, we were all blown away. This experience exceeded my expectations and I keep finding reasons why I need Chef Greg to cook for us again. Do yourself a favor and hire Chef Greg for your next special occasion.

originalText.text: I hosted a 30th birthday party for my wife in NJ and hired Chef Greg. Prior to the event, he was extremely responsive and accommodative on the menu (especially with a nut allergy in the group). He showed up on time and everything we ate was beyond delicious. Highly recommend hiring Chef Greg for your private event and I will hopefully be doing it again soon. Thanks Chef!
